Objective.shortTerm: Gaining hands-on experience and secure a position as a full-time employee within the company

WorkingExp.title: Collaborator
description: Assisting with administrative office tasks, along with various duties and manual labor

WorkingExp.title: Prompt Engineering and AI's response Evaluator
description: Creating prompts that match project's goals and instructions
Reviewing and evaluating AI's responses based on clarity, relevance and accuracy, with careful attention to instruction following
Using domain knowledge such as Mathematics and Programming to verify the correctness of claims made in AI responses, and identifying subtle errors or misleading information
Providing feedback to help improve quality and consitency of models

designing text and file transfering protocols using Sockets
Projects.deliverables: A server-client program that can transfer messages and files, capable of handling multiple clients simultaneously while limiting the number of connections from a single IP address

Projects.title: Penetration testing tool

Projects.title: Encrypting and Decrypting C++ program

Projects.title: Blockchain model Implementation
Projects.deliverables: A Blockchain Golang program with core functionalities, including adding new transactions, displaying transaction details, validating transactions and creating a new blockchain
